name: Anonymous
message:
When I'm old, grey and living in a nursing home, I want adult-sized batman nappies!

Kudos to you for doing the cloth nappy thing - we went disposable with 3 kids - including girl/boy twins so it always felt like we took a double-hit at the cash register everytime we bought nappies.  Must admit that I didn't know you could get such fun cloth nappies...
